A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not a fanboy (or a boy at all)\, though I enjoyed the original trilogy quite a lot. This movie is simply a narrative mess with so many shaggy dog dead-ends and extraneous characters...Why the critics are so praising of it I'll never know. My biggest gripe: It's long past time for a Black Jedi. Why can't there be two? Why do the white woman get all the glory and win all the gold stars? (I'm a white woman incidentally...) Such a disappointment.
